embed.description: **Keywords** are special words that can change how a card acts or is triggered. They are highlighted in a card's description, and are described when examining the card.

fields.name: Aimless
fields.value: Hit a random target in the opposing row. When applied by another card in play, it will override Barrage.

fields.name: Barrage
fields.value: Hits all targets in the opposing row.

fields.name: Consume
fields.value: The card is destroyed after use.

fields.name: Critical
fields.value: Doubles the effect when the card is the rightmost card in the player's hand.

fields.name: Draw X
fields.value: The player draws the number of cards equal to X. Shuffles the discard deck if no cards are available.

fields.name: Explode X
fields.value: Damages all enemies in the opposing row on death equal to X.

fields.name: Faith X
fields.value: Increases summon's <&Attack&> equal to X

fields.name: Fury X
fields.value: When a card is alone in a row, gain <&Attack&> equal to X.

fields.name: Greed
fields.value: Deal 1 additional damage for each 50 <&Bling&> you have.

fields.name: Hogheaded
fields.value: The card cannot be recalled to the discard deck and healed.

fields.name: Longshot
fields.value: Hit the furthest enemy in the row.

fields.name: Noomlin
fields.value: Does not cost a turn to use. Comes with a Noomlin hanging off the card.

fields.name: Recycle X
fields.value: The player must have X number of Junk cards in their hand to play the card. The Junk is then destroyed.

fields.name: Sacrificed
fields.value: Killed by its own team. Can be seen as a trigger in a card description.

fields.name: Smackback
fields.value: On hit, the card immediately reacts with a hit to the attacking card. Disabled when <&Snow&>'d.

fields.name: Soulbound
fields.value: Applied in pairs. When one card with Soulbound is destroyed, deal 100 damage to other Soulbound cards.

fields.name: Spark
fields.value: Trigger immediately when deployed. Cannot be recalled.

fields.name: Summoned
fields.value: This card was summoned by another card. When this card activates, it will lose 1 <&Health&>.

fields.name: Trash X
fields.value: Adds X number of Junk cards to the player's hand when activated.

fields.name: Unmovable
fields.value: The card cannot be moved around.

fields.name: Wild
fields.value: Gains x1 <&Frenzy&> when another card with Wild is destroyed.

fields.name: Yank
fields.value: Pulls the targeted card to the front of the row.

fields.name: Injured
fields.value: The Companion was killed in the previous battle and it starts with <&Health&> and <&Attack&> halved, rounding up. The card will heal completely after surviving a battle (whether the card is played or not), otherwise an injured card that is again killed simply retains its injured status.

embed.title: Keywords
